nodes.text: Akeeli Somerce was the assistant to the Prex, Chils Meplin. She was dispatched to discreetly kill Fiolla and Naven Crel after the latter learned about Meplin's leaking of CSA secrets to the Galactic Empire. While Somerce was able to surprise the pair, Fiolla stalled her long enough for Crel to use Fiolla's blaster to kill Somerce. However, Somerce did manage to inflict a mortal wound on Crel before being killed.
